A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I cannot believe this is a Star Wars movie. It felt like a parody with good visual effects... It was very anticlimactic. The plot does not make any sense and filled with many unexplained holes. It felt like a kid movie more than a sci-fi movie. This movie is a huge letdown compared to the hype and previous star wars movie but it has good visual effect... Not to mention the unnecessary political agenda and feminist view portrayed. To avoid watching.
